original: Keśava: Sāṃkhyatattvapradīpikā (or Sāṃkhyārthatattvapradīpikā)
oṃ namaḥ paramātmane /
analyzed: om namaḥ paramātmane

original: sāṃkhyatattvapradīpikā /
durnivāramanastāpanivāraṇapaṭīyasīm /
analyzed: durnivāra manaḥ tāpa nivāraṇa paṭīyasīm

original: jagadānandasandohajananīmahamāśraye // 1 //
analyzed: jagat ānanda sandoha jananīm aham āśraye

original: bhaṭṭakeśavasambhūtasadānandātmajaḥ sudhīḥ /
yajurvit keśavaḥ prāha kiñcit sāṃkhye yathāmati // 2 //
analyzed: yajuḥ vid keśavaḥ prāha kiñcid sāṃkhye yathāmati

original: iha dvividhaṃ tattvaṃ prakṛtiḥ puruṣaśceti /
analyzed: iha dvividham tattvam prakṛtiḥ puruṣaḥ ca iti

original: prakṛtireva pradhānamityabhidhīyate sattvāditriguṇā nityeti prakṛtisvarūpalakṣaṇam /
analyzed: prakṛtiḥ eva pradhānam iti abhidhīyate sattva ādi triguṇā nityā iti prakṛti svarūpa lakṣaṇam

original: vikārarahitattvācca nityaiveyam /
analyzed: vikāra rahita tvāt ca nityā eva iyam

original: puruṣe ativyāptivāraṇāya sattvāditriguṇetyuktam /
analyzed: puruṣe ativyāpti vāraṇāya sattva ādi triguṇa iti uktam

original: sattvādayastrayo guṇā yasyā iti vigrahaḥ /
analyzed: sattva ādayaḥ trayaḥ guṇāḥ yasyāḥ iti vigrahaḥ

original: mahadāditattvānāmapi triguṇātmakatvāt tatrātiprasaṅgavāraṇāya nityeti /
analyzed: mahat ādi tattvānām api triguṇa ātmaka tvāt tatra atiprasaṅga vāraṇāya nityā iti

original: taṭasthalakṣaṇaṃ tu jagadupādānakāraṇaṃ prakṛtiriti /
analyzed: taṭastha lakṣaṇam tu jagat upādānakāraṇam prakṛtiḥ iti

original: tathāhi vimataṃ sukhaduḥkhamohasāmānyopādānakaṃ niyamena tadanvitasvabhāvatvāt yanniyamena
analyzed: tathā hi vimatam sukha duḥkha moha sāmānya upādānakam niyamena tad anvita svabhāva tvāt yat niyamena

original: yadanvitasvabhāvaṃ tat tatsāmānyopādānakaṃ yathā mṛtsāmānyānvitasvabhāvaṃ ghaṭaśarāvādi
analyzed: yad anvita svabhāvam tat tat sāmānya upādānakam yathā mṛd sāmānya anvita svabhāvam ghaṭa śarāva ādi

original: tathāhi kācana taruṇī kasyacit kāntasya sukhamutpādayati kasyacinmohaṃ kasyaciddveṣamiti
analyzed: tathā hi kācana taruṇī kasyacid kāntasya sukham utpādayati kasyacid moham kasyacid dveṣam iti

original: tatkasya hetostaṃ taṃ prati sukhaduḥkamohātmakasattvarajastamasāmāvirbhāvāt /
analyzed: tat kasya hetoḥ tam tam prati sukha duḥka moha ātmaka sattva rajaḥ tamasām āvirbhāvāt

original: sā ca caturviṃśatidhā prakṛteḥ prathamo mahāniti vikāraḥ pariṇāma iti yāvat mahattattvameva
analyzed: sā ca caturviṃśatidhā prakṛteḥ prathamaḥ mahān iti vikāraḥ pariṇāmaḥ iti yāvat mahat tattvam eva

original: buddhitattvamityabhidhīyate ahamityahaṃkārākhyo mahattattvasya prathamo vikāraḥ tadanantaraṃ
analyzed: buddhi tattvam iti abhidhīyate aham iti ahaṃkāra ākhyaḥ mahat tattvasya prathamaḥ vikāraḥ tad anantaram

original: pañcatanmātrāḥ śabdasparśarūparasagandhākhyā bhavati athākāśādibhūtapañcakaṃ athaikādaśākṣāṇi
analyzed: pañca tanmātrāḥ śabda sparśa rūpa rasa gandha ākhyā bhavati atha ākāśa ādi bhūta pañcakam atha ekādaśa akṣāṇi

original: śrotrasparśanacakṣūrasanaghrāṇavāggudaliṅgakaracaraṇāntaḥkaraṇānyekādaśendriyāṇi bhavanti /
analyzed: śrotra sparśana cakṣuḥ rasana ghrāṇa vāc guda liṅga kara caraṇa antaḥkaraṇāni ekādaśa indriyāṇi bhavanti

original: tatra mahattattvamahaṃkāratattvaṃ śabdādyāḥ pañcatanmātrā ityetat tattvasaptakaṃ prakṛtivikṛtibhāvāpannaṃ pūrvaṃ pūrvaṃ prati kāryatvamuttarottaraṃ  #
analyzed: tatra mahat tattvam ahaṃkāra tattvam śabda ādyāḥ pañca tanmātrāḥ iti etat tattva saptakam prakṛti vikṛti bhāva āpannam pūrvam pūrvam prati kārya tvam uttarottaram

original: prati kāraṇatvamityarthaḥ /
analyzed: prati kāraṇa tvam iti arthaḥ

original: tathāhi mahattattvaṃ mūlaprakṛteḥ kāryaṃ kāraṇaṃ cāhaṃkāratattvasya ahaṃkāratattvaṃ
analyzed: tathā hi mahat tattvam mūlaprakṛteḥ kāryam kāraṇam ca ahaṃkāra tattvasya ahaṃkāra tattvam

original: tathā mahattattvasya kāryaṃ kāraṇaṃ ca śabdatattvākhyāditanmātraṃ prati tathāhi tadapi
analyzed: tathā mahat tattvasya kāryam kāraṇam ca śabda tattva ākhyā ādi tanmātram prati tathā hi tat api

original: pūrvaṃ prati kāryamuttaraṃ prati kāraṇaṃ ceti bodhyam /
analyzed: pūrvam prati kāryam uttaram prati kāraṇam ca iti bodhyam

original: ākāśādibhūtapañcakamekādaśendriyāṇītyete punaḥ ṣoḍaśabhāvāśca prakṛtijanyā eva na tu kasyacit prakṛtiḥ tattvāntaropādānarūpatvābhāvāt /
analyzed: ākāśa ādi bhūta pañcakam ekādaśa indriyāṇi iti ete punar ṣoḍaśa bhāvāḥ ca prakṛti janyāḥ eva na tu kasyacid prakṛtiḥ tattva antara upādāna rūpa tva abhāvāt

original: seyaṃ prakṛtiracetanā pariṇāmitvāt /
analyzed: sā iyam prakṛtiḥ acetanā pariṇāmi tvāt

original: nanu viṣayāṇāṃ ghaṭādīnāṃ cetanasambandhaḥ sākṣādevāstu kiṃ mahadādipraṇālikayeti cet /
analyzed: nanu viṣayāṇām ghaṭa ādīnām cetana sambandhaḥ sākṣāt eva astu kim mahat ādi praṇālikayā iti ced

original: tat kiṃ citireva viṣayabandhanasvabhāvā tathā sati caityanyanityatayā mokṣaḥ kadāpi na syāt /
analyzed: tat kim citiḥ eva viṣaya bandhana svabhāvā tathā sati mokṣaḥ kadāpi na syāt

original: atha caitanyaṃ prakṛtau pratibimbitaṃ prakṛtiviṣayayostu sākṣāt sambandhaḥ syāt kiṃ mahadādineti cet tathāhi puruṣavannityatayā punaranirmokṣāpattireva
analyzed: atha caitanyam prakṛtau pratibimbitam prakṛti viṣayayoḥ tu sākṣāt sambandhaḥ syāt kim mahat ādinā iti ced tathā hi puruṣa vat nitya tayā punar anirmokṣa āpattiḥ eva

original: atha citirviṣayasambaddhasvabhāvā māstu viṣayā eva citisambaddhasvabhāvāḥ santu tathā
analyzed: atha citiḥ viṣaya sambaddha svabhāvā mā astu viṣayāḥ eva citi sambaddha svabhāvāḥ santu tathā

original: ca viṣayatirobhāve mokṣaḥ syāditi cet tarhīdaṃ dṛṣṭamiti na syāt sarvathā citisambandhasvābhāvyenāvyavadhānāt /
analyzed: ca viṣaya tirobhāve mokṣaḥ syāt iti ced tarhi idam dṛṣṭam iti na syāt sarvathā citi sambandha svābhāvyena avyavadhānāt

original: atha viṣayā indriyadvārā citisambaddhātmānaḥ santu dṛṣṭādṛṣṭavyavahārādi sannikarṣaviprakarṣābhyāmupapatsyata
analyzed: atha viṣayāḥ indriya dvārā citi sambaddha ātmānaḥ santu dṛṣṭa adṛṣṭa vyavahāra ādi sannikarṣa viprakarṣābhyām upapatsyata

original: iti cenna vyāsaṅgānupapatteḥ indriyasambaddhe viṣaye jñānotpatterāvaśyakatvāt /
analyzed: iti ced na vyāsaṅga anupapatteḥ indriya sambaddhe viṣaye jñāna utpatteḥ āvaśyaka tvāt

original: atha vyāsaṅgānupapattyā manaḥ kalpyatāṃ kimahaṃkāreṇa maivaṃ evaṃ ca sati svasmin
analyzed: atha vyāsaṅga anupapattyā manaḥ kalpyatām kim ahaṃkāreṇa mā evam evam ca sati svasmin

original: vyāghrohaṃ varāhohamiti nāropayet kiṃtvindriyaṃ manodvārā citisambaddhaṃ svakīyaṃ
analyzed: vyāghraḥ ūham varāhaḥ ūham iti na āropayet kiṃtu indriyam manaḥ dvārā citi sambaddham svakīyam

original: naratvameva gṛhṇīyāt /
analyzed: nara tvam eva gṛhṇīyāt

original: athaivamahaṃkārostu svapnadaśāyāmāropārthaṃ buddhitattve na mānamasti maivaṃ suṣuptyavasthāyāṃ
analyzed: atha evam ahaṃkāroḥ tu svapna daśāyām āropa artham buddhi tattve na mānam asti mā evam suṣupti avasthāyām

original: manovadahaṃkāropi nivṛttavyāpāra eva tathā ca śvāsaprayojakajīvanayoniyatnasya vyāpāraḥ
analyzed: manaḥ vat ahaṃkāraḥ api nivṛtta vyāpāraḥ eva tathā ca śvāsa prayojaka jīvana yoni yatnasya vyāpāraḥ

original: syāditi tadanurodhena buddhitattvasyāpyāvaśyakatvāt tasmādbuddhitattvaṃ parigamena(?)
analyzed: syāt iti tad anurodhena buddhi tattvasya api āvaśyaka tvāt tasmāt buddhi tattvam parigamena

original: sambaddho viṣayo gajaturagamahiṣādiḥ puruṣeṇa caitanyena sambadhyate tata āsaṃsārabuddhitattvanāśādeva ca mokṣa iti nānirmokṣaḥ /
analyzed: sambaddhaḥ viṣayaḥ gaja turaga mahiṣa ādiḥ puruṣeṇa caitanyena sambadhyate tatas ā saṃsāra buddhi tattva nāśāt eva ca mokṣaḥ iti na anirmokṣaḥ

original: akāraṇamakāryaṃ ca kūṭasthacaitanyarūpaḥ puruṣaḥ atrāyaṃ puruṣaḥ svayaṃ jyotiriti
analyzed: akāraṇam akāryam ca kūṭastha caitanya rūpaḥ puruṣaḥ atra ayam puruṣaḥ svayam jyotiḥ iti

original: śrutyā tāvat svaprakāśamātmano 'bhidhīyate svaprakāśaṃ ca vijñānameva tenātmanaḥ
analyzed: śrutyā tāvat sva prakāśam ātmanaḥ bhidhīyate sva prakāśam ca vijñānam eva tena ātmanaḥ

original: svaprakāśatvamabhidadhatīyaṃ śrutirvijñānātmakatāṃ puruṣasyāvedayati /
analyzed: sva prakāśa tvam abhidadhatī iyam śrutiḥ vijñāna ātmaka tām puruṣasya āvedayati

original: na ca kṣaṇikasya jñānasya nityapuruṣātmakatvaṃ sambhavatīti jñānasya kṣaṇabhaṅguratvāsiddheḥ
analyzed: na ca kṣaṇikasya jñānasya nitya puruṣa ātmaka tvam sambhavati iti jñānasya kṣaṇa bhaṅgura tva asiddheḥ

original: vināśavyavahārasya tava ghaṭākāśadivināśavyavahāravadaupādhikatvenāpyupapatteḥ puruṣātiriktacaitanyasvīkartustavāpi
analyzed: vināśa vyavahārasya tava ghaṭa ākāśa di vināśa vyavahāra vat aupādhika tvena api upapatteḥ puruṣa atirikta caitanya svīkartuḥ tava api

original: mate jñānasya kṣaṇikatve mānābhāvaḥ anyathā kālāntare 'nubhūtasmaraṇānupapattiḥ /
na ca saṃskāro dvāraṃ tatkalpanāpekṣayā jñānasya sthairyakalpanāyāṃ lāghavāt nityatvāccāsau
analyzed: na ca saṃskāraḥ dvāram tad kalpanā apekṣayā jñānasya sthairya kalpanāyām lāghavāt nitya tvāt ca asau

original: na kasyacidvikāraḥ na vā kāraṇaṃ svaprakāśatvāt yadi hi svaprakāśasyāpyasya prakṛtitvamāśrīyate
analyzed: na kasyacid vikāraḥ na vā kāraṇam sva prakāśa tvāt yadi hi sva prakāśasya api asya prakṛti tvam āśrīyate

original: tarhyetadvikṛtitvenābhimatasyāpi svaprakāśatvamasya vā jaḍatvamāpadyeta samānayoreva
analyzed: tarhi etat vikṛti tvena abhimatasya api sva prakāśa tvam asya vā jaḍa tvam āpadyeta samānayoḥ eva

original: prakṛtivikṛtibhāvopalambhāt bhedāgrahācca niṣkriyepi puruṣe kartṛtvābhimānaḥ evaṃ
analyzed: prakṛti vikṛti bhāva upalambhāt bheda agrahāt ca niṣkriye api puruṣe kartṛ tva abhimānaḥ evam

original: sukhaduḥkhādivyavahāropi tathāhi pariśuddhacaitanyavigrahaḥ prakṛtivikṛtibhāvānapetataṭasthaḥ
analyzed: sukha duḥkha ādi vyavahāraḥ api tathā hi pariśuddha caitanya vigrahaḥ prakṛti vikṛti bhāva an apeta taṭasthaḥ

original: puṣkarapalāśavannirlepo 'pyantaḥkaraṇākārapariṇataprakṛtitādātmyamavivekalakṣaṇamavidyayā
analyzed: puṣkara palāśa vat nirlepaḥ pi antaḥkaraṇa ākāra pariṇata prakṛti tādātmyam aviveka lakṣaṇam avidyayā

original: pratipadyate tataścetaretarādhyāsādantaḥkaraṇāvṛttīnāṃ duḥkhādīnāṃ puruṣe puruṣadharmāṇāṃ
analyzed: pratipadyate tatas ca itaretara adhyāsāt antaḥkaraṇa āvṛttīnām duḥkha ādīnām puruṣe puruṣa dharmāṇām

original: ciccaitanyādīnāmantaḥkaraṇe 'dhyāsādahaṃ duḥkhītyādivyavahāro bhavatīti /
analyzed: cit caitanya ādīnām antaḥkaraṇe dhyāsāt aham duḥkhī ityādi vyavahāraḥ bhavati iti

original: avidyānāmātāttvikī khyātiḥ sā ca tamoguṇodrekādāvirbhavantī viviktayostādātmyamavabhāsayati /
analyzed: avidyā nāma a tāttvikī khyātiḥ sā ca tamaḥ guṇa udrekāt āvirbhavantī viviktayoḥ tādātmyam avabhāsayati

original: tataścottareṣāmasmitārāgadveṣābhiniveśānāṃ kleśaśabdābhidheyānāṃ heturavidyeti gīyate /
analyzed: tatas ca uttareṣām asmitā rāga dveṣa abhiniveśānām kleśa śabda abhidheyānām hetuḥ avidyā iti gīyate

original: tatsiddhaṃ nirlepa evāyamiti /
analyzed: tat siddham nirlepaḥ eva ayam iti

original: asaṅgo hyayamiti śruterupapadyate ca /
analyzed: a saṅgaḥ hi ayam iti śruteḥ upapadyate ca

original: na ca kopyasya vyāpāra iti ālocanaṃ tāvadindriyavyāpāraḥ vikalpastu manasaḥ abhimānohaṃkārasya kṛtyadhyavasāyo buddheḥ /
analyzed: na ca kopyasya vyāpāraḥ iti ālocanam tāvat indriya vyāpāraḥ vikalpaḥ tu manasaḥ abhimāna uhaṃkārasya kṛti adhyavasāyaḥ buddheḥ

original: atha kṛtyadhyavasāyaḥ kṛtimattayā jñānaṃ tatkathamacetanāyā buddheriti buddhiraṃśatrayavatī puruṣoparāgo viṣayoparāgo vyāpārāveśaśceti /
analyzed: atha kṛti adhyavasāyaḥ kṛtimat tayā jñānam tat katham acetanāyāḥ buddheḥ iti buddhiḥ aṃśa trayavatī puruṣa uparāgaḥ viṣaya uparāgaḥ vyāpāra āveśaḥ ca iti

original: bhavati hi mamedaṃ kartavyamiti tatra mametyaṃśaścetanasya darpaṇanirmalāyā buddheḥ
analyzed: bhavati hi mama idam kartavyam iti tatra mama iti aṃśaḥ cetanasya darpaṇa nirmalāyāḥ buddheḥ

original: pratibimba upadhānaṃ taccātāttvikameva caitanyena buddhervāstavasambandhābhāvāt yathā
analyzed: pratibimbaḥ upadhānam tat ca atāttvikam eva caitanyena buddheḥ vāstava sambandha abhāvāt yathā

original: darpaṇaṃ mukhasambandhamantareṇāpi puruṣabhramastadvadihāpi /
analyzed: darpaṇam mukha sambandham antareṇa api puruṣa bhramaḥ tadvat iha api

original: idamiti viṣayopadhānaṃ tacca vāstavameka indriyapraṇālikayā buddhau jñānarūpaviṣayasambandhāt
analyzed: idam iti viṣaya upadhānam tat ca vāstavam ekaḥ indriya praṇālikayā buddhau jñāna rūpa viṣaya sambandhāt

original: darpaṇasyeva niḥśvāsābhihatasya malinimā pāramārthikaḥ puruṣoparāgaḥ viṣayoparāgamāhimnā
analyzed: darpaṇasya iva niḥśvāsa abhihatasya malinimā pāramārthikaḥ puruṣa uparāgaḥ viṣaya uparāgam āhimnā

original: ca kṛtimattayādhyavasāyaḥ ayameva vyāpārāveśaḥ /
analyzed: ca kṛtimat tayā adhyavasāyaḥ ayam eva vyāpāra āveśaḥ

original: atha jñānameva caitanyaṃ kathamanayorbheda iti ucyate kṛtyadhyavasāyalakṣaṇavyāpāraviśiṣṭā
analyzed: atha jñānam eva caitanyam katham anayoḥ bhedaḥ iti ucyate kṛti adhyavasāya lakṣaṇa vyāpāra viśiṣṭā

original: buddhirindriyapraṇālikayā buddherviṣayasya ghaṭādeḥ sambandho vṛttiviśeṣastadeva
analyzed: buddhiḥ indriya praṇālikayā buddheḥ viṣayasya ghaṭa ādeḥ sambandhaḥ vṛtti viśeṣaḥ tat eva

original: jñānaṃ viṣayoparāgeṇa saha yaḥ puruṣoparāgasyātāttvikaḥ sambandhaḥ sa upalabdhiḥ
analyzed: jñānam viṣaya uparāgeṇa saha yaḥ puruṣa uparāgasya a tāttvikaḥ sambandhaḥ saḥ upalabdhiḥ

original: yathā darpaṇaniṣṭhā malinimā darpaṇapratibimbitamukhe dṛśyate tatheti yāvat /
analyzed: yathā darpaṇa niṣṭhā malinimā darpaṇa pratibimbita mukhe dṛśyate tathā iti yāvat

original: tathā ghaṭamahaṃ jānāmītyanuvyavasāyākhyopalabdhiriti vibhāvanīyam /
analyzed: tathā ghaṭam aham jānāmi iti anuvyavasāya ākhyā upalabdhiḥ iti vibhāvanīyam

original: tadeva jñānaṃ sukhaduḥkhecchādveṣaprayatnadharmādharmarūpā aṣṭau bhāvā buddhereva ahaṃ jāne sukhītyādisāmānādhikaraṇyapratīteḥ /
analyzed: tat eva jñānam sukha duḥkha icchā dveṣa prayatna dharma adharma rūpāḥ aṣṭau bhāvāḥ buddheḥ eva aham jāne sukhī ityādi sāmānādhikaraṇya pratīteḥ

original: nanu yatraite dharmāḥ sa eva cetanaḥ kiṃ na syāditi cenna anityadharmarūpatayā pariṇāmitvāt dharmadharmiṇorabhedāt /
analyzed: nanu yatra ete dharmāḥ saḥ eva cetanaḥ kim na syāt iti ced na anitya dharma rūpa tayā pariṇāmi tvāt dharma dharmiṇoḥ abhedāt

original: ye punastayorbhedaṃ pratipannāstārkikaprabhṛtayaste tāvannīlo ghaṭā ityādyabhedāvagāhipratyayamapaśyanta upekṣaṇīyāḥ /
analyzed: ye punar tayoḥ bhedam pratipannāḥ tārkika prabhṛtayaḥ te tāvat nīlaḥ ghaṭāḥ ityādi abheda avagāhi pratyayam apaśyantaḥ upekṣaṇīyāḥ

original: nanu pradhānasyācaitanyasya kathaṃ jagatkartṛtvaṃ yat khalu nāmnā rūpeṇa ca vyākriyate taccetanakartṛkaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yathā ghaṭādi /
analyzed: nanu pradhānasya acaitanyasya katham jagat kartṛ tvam yat khalu nāmnā rūpeṇa ca vyākriyate tat cetana kartṛkam dṛṣṭam yathā ghaṭa ādi

original: vivādādhyāsitaṃ ca jagannāmarūpeṇa vyākṛtaṃ tasmāccetanakartṛkamiti sambhāvyate cetano
analyzed: vivāda adhyāsitam ca jagat nāma rūpeṇa vyākṛtam tasmāt cetana kartṛkam iti sambhāvyate cetano

original: hi buddhāvālikhya nāmarūpe ghaṭā iti nāmnā rūpeṇa ca kambugrīvādinā bāhyaṃ ghaṭaṃ niṣpādayati /
analyzed: hi buddhau ālikhya nāma rūpe ghaṭāḥ iti nāmnā rūpeṇa ca kambu grīvā ādinā bāhyam ghaṭam niṣpādayati

original: ata eva ghaṭasya nivartyasyāpyantaḥsaṃkalpātmanā siddhasya karmakārakabhāvo ghaṭaṃ karotīti /
analyzed: atas eva ghaṭasya nivartyasya api antar saṃkalpa ātmanā siddhasya karma kāraka bhāvaḥ ghaṭam karoti iti

original: atra vadāmaḥ caitanyasya jagadupādānatve jagato jaḍatvānupapattiḥ yat kāryaṃ taccetanakartṛkamiti
analyzed: atra vadāmaḥ caitanyasya jagat upādāna tve jagataḥ jaḍa tva anupapattiḥ yat kāryam tat cetana kartṛkam iti

original: vyāptyā śarīrī kartā syāt kiṃ ca tathāpi jñānasya caitanyaviśiṣṭasya kṣityādijanakatve
analyzed: vyāptyā śarīrī kartā syāt kim ca tathā api jñānasya caitanya viśiṣṭasya kṣiti ādi janaka tve

original: mānābhāvaḥ kulālādijñānecchayoḥ kṛtijanakatvenaivānyathāsiddhatvāt īśvarakṛteśca janyatvāt /
analyzed: māna abhāvaḥ kulāla ādi jñāna icchayoḥ kṛti janaka tvena eva anyathāsiddha tvāt īśvara kṛteḥ ca janya tvāt

original: atha yaḥ kṛtimān sa jñānavāniti vyāptyā tatsiddhiḥ evaṃ hi yo jñānavān sa sukhītyādivyāptyā sukhamapīśvare syāt aprayojakatvaṃ cet tulyaṃ tavāpi
analyzed: atha yaḥ kṛtimān sa jñānavān iti vyāptyā tad siddhiḥ evam hi yaḥ jñānavān sa sukhī ityādi vyāptyā sukham api īśvare syāt aprayojaka tvam ced tulyam tava api

original: karmaiva jagatkāraṇamityapi ye pratipannāste tāvannatyantaṃ pārihartavyāḥ dharmādharmātmakārthānarthalakṣaṇacodanālakṣaṇasya
analyzed: karma eva jagat kāraṇam iti api ye pratipannāḥ te tāvat atyantam pārihartavyāḥ dharma adharma ātmaka artha anartha lakṣaṇa codanā lakṣaṇasya

original: prakṛtyabhedāt buddhyākārapariṇatāyā eva prakṛteraṣṭau bhāvā ityabhyupagamāt /
analyzed: prakṛti abhedāt buddhi ākāra pariṇatāyāḥ eva prakṛteḥ aṣṭau bhāvāḥ iti abhyupagamāt

original: athedānīṃ pramāṇaṃ vivecayāmaḥ /
analyzed: atha idānīm pramāṇam vivecayāmaḥ

original: tat tāvat trividham pratyakṣānugamānāgamabhedāt /
analyzed: tat tāvat trividham pratyakṣa anugama anāgama bhedāt

original: pratyakṣapramākaraṇaṃ pratyakṣam /
analyzed: pratyakṣa pramā karaṇam pratyakṣam

original: liṅgamanumānam /
analyzed: liṅgam anumānam

original: athātītānāgatayoḥ kathaṃ liṅgabhāvaḥ jātyā dharmādharmātmanā tatsattvāt /
analyzed: atha atīta anāgatayoḥ katham liṅga bhāvaḥ jātyā dharma adharma ātmanā tad sattvāt

original: āptavacanaṃ śabdaḥ yathāsminnarapatinilaye gajarathaturagāḥ santīti /
analyzed: āpta vacanam śabdaḥ yathā asmin narapati nilaye gaja ratha turagāḥ santi iti

original: pānthasakalādhyāyavacana(?)
analyzed: pāntha sakala adhyāya vacana

original: manumāne caritārthatvānnopamānamarhati /
analyzed: manumāne caritārtha tvāt na upamānam arhati

original: arthāpattirabhāvaśca sambhavaśceṣṭitaṃ tathā /
analyzed: arthāpattiḥ abhāvaḥ ca sambhavaḥ ceṣṭitam tathā

original: naitihyamāgamātaddhi vyaktamanyatra vistarāt //
analyzed: vyaktam anyatra vistarāt

original: sa cāyaṃ puruṣaḥ pratiśarīraṃ bhinnaḥ /
analyzed: sa ca ayam puruṣaḥ pratiśarīram bhinnaḥ

original: tathāhi vimatāni śarīrāṇi svasaṃkhyāsaṃkhyeyātmavanti śarīratvāt sampratipannavat
analyzed: tathā hi vimatāni śarīrāṇi sva saṃkhyā saṃkhyeya ātmavanti śarīra tvāt sampratipanna vat

original: kiṃ caivaṃ yathaikasminneva jīvati devadatte śarīre jāte vā ceṣṭāvati vā mṛte vā
analyzed: kim ca evam yathā ekasmin eva jīvati devadatte śarīre jāte vā ceṣṭāvati vā mṛte vā

original: bhāvopi jātaceṣṭāvān mṛtaḥ kileti loko vyavaharati tathā śarīrāntarepi tathaiva vyavahārāt
analyzed: bhāvaḥ api jāta ceṣṭāvān mṛtaḥ kila iti lokaḥ vyavaharati tathā śarīra antare pi tathā eva vyavahārāt

original: tasmāt puruṣabhedobhyupeyaḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt puruṣa bhedaḥ abhyupeyaḥ

original: ekamevādvitīyamityādiśruteśca kathañcidupacaritārthatvena tathā ātmano hi vibhuniyatvādabhinnadeśakālā
analyzed: ekam eva advitīyam ityādi śruteḥ ca kathañcid upacarita artha tvena tathā ātmanaḥ hi

original: ityekatvenocyate ajo hyeko juṣamāṇo 'nuśete jahātyenāṃ bhuktabhogāmajo 'nya ityādiśruteśca
analyzed: iti eka tvena ucyate ajaḥ hi ekaḥ juṣamāṇaḥ nuśete jahāti enām bhukta bhogām ajaḥ nyaḥ ityādi śruteḥ ca

original: puruṣabhedamavagacchāmaḥ /
analyzed: puruṣa bhedam avagacchāmaḥ

original: kiṃ punarasya prayojanaṃ niḥśreyasaṃ kiṃ tat akhilānarthamūlabhūtāyā avidyāyāḥ sattvātiśayaviśeṣāvirbhūtavidyayā
analyzed: kim punar asya prayojanam niḥśreyasam kim tat akhila anartha mūla bhūtāyāḥ avidyāyāḥ sattva atiśaya viśeṣa āvirbhūta vidyayā

original: vināśe sati tatpuruṣasya sahajacaitanyātmanāvasthānaṃ tanmokṣāparaparyāyaṃ niḥśreyasaṃ
analyzed: vināśe sati tatpuruṣasya sahaja caitanya ātmanā avasthānam tat mokṣa apara paryāyam niḥśreyasam

original: prakṛtipuruṣavivekajñānaṃ ca taddhetuḥ /
analyzed: prakṛti puruṣa viveka jñānam ca tad hetuḥ

original: nanu prakṛternityatvāt punarapi tamodrekasambhavādavidyāvirbhāvasambhave muktipracyutiḥ syāditi /
analyzed: nanu prakṛteḥ nitya tvāt punar api tama udreka sambhavāt avidyā āvirbhāva sambhave mukti pracyutiḥ syāt iti

original: naitat dṛḍhatamacittavṛttinirodhalakṣaṇayogabalāt punarudrekānupapatteḥ /
analyzed: na etat dṛḍhatama cittavṛtti nirodha lakṣaṇa yoga balāt punar udreka anupapatteḥ

original: yadāhuḥ sa tu dīrghakālanairantaryasatkārasevito dṛḍhabhūmirvyutthānasaṃskāreṇa na bādhyata iti /
analyzed: yat āhuḥ sa tu dīrgha kāla nairantarya satkāra sevitaḥ dṛḍha bhūmiḥ vyutthāna saṃskāreṇa na bādhyate iti

original: atha nirlepasyāsya mahāpuruṣasya sambandha eva na kuto 'pavarga iti satyamāha kiṃ tu prakṛtereva bandhamokṣau puṃsyupacaryete tadāhuḥ /
analyzed: atha nirlepasya asya mahāpuruṣasya sambandhaḥ eva na kutas pavargaḥ iti satyam āha kim tu prakṛteḥ eva bandha mokṣau puṃsi upacaryete tat āhuḥ

original: rūpaiḥ saptabhirevaṃ badhnātyātmānamātmanā prakṛtiḥ /
analyzed: rūpaiḥ saptabhiḥ evam badhnāti ātmānam ātmanā prakṛtiḥ

original: saiva ca puruṣasyārthaṃ vimocayatyekarūpeṇa // iti /
analyzed: sā eva ca puruṣasya artham vimocayati eka rūpeṇa iti

original: ayamarthaḥ dharmādharmavairāgyāvairāgyaiśvaryānaiśvaryajñānājñānānyaṣṭau prakṛtirūpāṇi
analyzed: ayam arthaḥ dharma adharma vairāgya avairāgya aiśvarya anaiśvarya jñāna ajñānāni aṣṭau prakṛti rūpāṇi

original: tatra jñānavyatiriktaiḥ dharmādharmādyaiḥ saptabhī rūpaiḥ prakṛtirātmanaivātmānaṃ
analyzed: tatra jñāna vyatiriktaiḥ dharma adharma ādyaiḥ saptabhiḥ rūpaiḥ prakṛtiḥ ātmanā eva ātmānam

original: badhnāti ekarūpeṇa jñānākhyena ca vimocayatīti /
analyzed: badhnāti eka rūpeṇa jñāna ākhyena ca vimocayati iti

original: yadāhuḥ /
analyzed: yat āhuḥ

original: dharmeṇa gamanamūrdhvaṃ gamanamadhastādbhavatyadharmeṇa /
analyzed: dharmeṇa gamanam ūrdhvam gamanam adhastāt bhavati adharmeṇa

original: jñānena cāpavargo viparyayādiṣyate bandham // iti /
analyzed: jñānena ca apavargaḥ viparyayāt iṣyate bandham iti

original: śiṣṭaṃ sakalamakalaṅkaṃ cābhyudayasiddhāntasiddhamityupekṣitamiti /
analyzed: śiṣṭam sakalam akalaṅkam ca abhyudaya siddhānta siddham iti upekṣitam iti

original: darśitānarthamūlāya sarvatattvārthadarśine /
analyzed: darśita anartha mūlāya sarva tattva artha darśine

original: karuṇāpūrṇacittāya kapilāya namo namaḥ //
analyzed: karuṇā pūrṇa cittāya kapilāya namaḥ namaḥ

original: iti sāṃkhyārthatattvapradīpikā samāptā //
analyzed: iti sāṃkhya artha tattva pradīpikā samāptā
